title: Hey Crazy Penne Lyrics Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kanom (2012) Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Hey Crazy Penne
SingeR: Ved shankar
Movie: Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kanom (2012)
Music: Ved Shankar
Lyrics: Ved Shankar

Hey Crazy Penne, Yaaradi Neeye
My cutey cuddly littly lovely melody neeye
Hey Crazy Penne, lonely naane
thaniyaa thavikkavittu engae sendari neeye

Unnale nenjinulle tring tring
sonnaale ullukulle something

Idle chatni pola, chenna poori pola
super jodi kedachidumaami
Meri jaani, dil ki rani
ennai nhoki varuvaaya neeyi

Adiye en radhiye oru nodiye nil adiye
Vizhiyaal un vizhiyaal naan vizhundhendi
Irudi hey thirudi nee konjam thaana sirudi
Marudhaani poove ne konjam konjadi

Kaalaiyil ennai kadhal seiya
kaalam muzhudhum kapene naane
Marupadi neeyum maru uyir thandhaai
manathil niraindhai marumamaai neeye

Kuyile koo kuyile aval idame sel adiye
kadhal en kadhal konjam solli vaayen
marupa ava muraipa unna thorathi thorathi adipa
avale en uyirin kadhalliye

Hey Crazy Penne, Yaaradi Neeye
My cutey cuddly littly lovely melody neeye
Hey Crazy Penne, lonely naane
thaniyaa thavikkavittu engae sendari neeye

Unnale nenjinulle tring tring
sonnaale ullukulle something
category: Song:Hey Crazy Penne - Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kanom
